title: Change dashboard check-in button label to “CHECK IN”

requirements.text: Update the manual dashboard check-in CTA button label so it displays exactly “CHECK IN” instead of “START CHECK IN”.

quotes: yes, on the button where it says START CHECK IN, make only say CHECK IN

acceptanceCriteria: On the Dashboard page, the manual check-in button text reads exactly “CHECK IN”.
The button no longer contains the words “START” or “START CHECK IN” anywhere in its visible label.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them as-is).
Do not edit files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not change the check-in flow logic, modal behavior, or backend endpoints.
Do not change button styling, layout, or iconography beyond the label text.
